Primer of Ecology using R Preface

Primer of Ecology using R Hank Stevens 2020-09-20 Preface This book is dedicated to Dr. Zac Long, whose desire to publish with Robert Peters and Donald Strong has inspired me to continue to strive for my goals. In spite of the presumptuous title, my goals for this book are modest. I wrote it as the manual I wish I had in graduate school, and a primer for our graduate course in Population and Community Ecology at Miami University.1 To install the latest version of the primer R package, install it directly from GitHub. To do this, install the devtools package. To successfully do that on a Windows operating system, I think you need to install Rtools: https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/ Once you have done all that, use this code: devtools::install_github("HankStevens/primer") Miami University is located in the Miami River valley in Oxford, Ohio, USA; the region is home to the Myaamia tribe that dwelled here prior to European occupation.↩︎
